info.description: This is a sample server for a simple e-commerce API.
info.title: E-Commerce API

get.description: Get all orders with pagination and filtering
Get detailed information about an order by its ID
get.summary: Get order details by ID (Admin endpoint)

get.description: Get ratings for a specific product

delete.description: Delete a product rating by ID

post.description: Approve a product rating by ID
Ban a user from rating by setting their rating to invisible

get.description: Get attributes and their values for a product
get.summary: Get attributes and their values by for a product

get.description: get cart details by user ID
get.summary: Get cart details by user ID

post.description: create a new cart for a user
update product items in the cart
post.summary: Update product items in the cart

delete.description: remove a product from the cart
delete.summary: Remove a product from the cart

post.description: add a product to the cart
post.summary: update product quantity in the cart

get.description: Get a list of Products by Category Slug
get.summary: Get a list of Products by Category Slug

get.description: get list of product image by ID
get.summary: Get list of product image by ID

delete.description: remove a product by external ID
delete.summary: Remove a product by external ID

get.description: List orders of the current user
Get order detail by order ID

put.description: Change order status by order ID

post.description: create a new product with the input payload

delete.description: delete a product variant with the input payload

post.description: create a new product with the input payload

put.description: update a product with the input payload

post.description: upload a product variant image with the input payload

get.description: get a product detail by ID
get.summary: Get a product detail by ID

get.description: Get ratings for a specific order
Get ratings for a specific product

post.description: Post a reply to a product rating
post.summary: Post a reply to a rating

get.description: Get a list of brands for the shop

details.description:
Details contains gateway-specific payment information.
The type may vary depending on the payment provider, and is typically a struct or map[string]interface{}.
